complaint.description: When someone tries to phone me, there is a strange ringtone that pops up. It has happened numerous times and then I need to unsubscribe. But somehow it puts itself back on?! I do not subscribe to ANY content services, I have spoken to Vodacom to block this and it has not worked. I have tried speaking to someone again after the first time but there is no answer and the 'chat bot' tells me that I do not have active subscriptions yet the ringtone won't go off!! I am truly disappointed in the customer service, this subscription uses my airtime and I keep having to top-up outside of my bundle. Truly disappointed and Vodacom is the biggest cellphone company in SA. Shocking.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate the issue with the ringtone and ensure that the customer is not subscribed to any unwanted content services. Improve customer service response time and provide a solution to stop the ringtone from reappearing.
